name: Lamp
description:
Lamp is a 3D stealth game featuring a group of explorers gathered to save the universe from the Curse, a dark mist that turns evil the inhabitants of the little planets. Travel around spherical levels in different historical periods, dodge the enemies corrupted by the Curse and find the magic lamps to restore the light in every level. Each of them presents new challenges and puzzles, like missing lamp pieces, smarter enemies, corrupted lamps and mazes. Your characters can also dig the ground to make tunnels and project trails of light to escape from enemies, but never forget to keep your coolness and sneak lightly behind them, it’s easier if they don’t spot you!

Lamp is a stealth game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course, Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria, Politecnico di Milano
